body: I don't know if this is going on for anyone else, or if I'm just completely clueless, But i cant connect to the server hub. So if somebody could tell me the direct names of the servers to connect to, that would be helpful
body_tagged: I don't know if this is going on for anyone else, or if I'm just completely clueless, But i cant connect to the server hub. So if somebody could tell me the direct names of the servers to connect to, that would be helpful
title: Server connection

replies.body: Try doing mczone01.avic.us then when you are in use the /server command to navigate around !
replies.body_tagged: Try doing mczone01.avic.us then when you are in use the /server command to navigate around !
